resources.string: Not all required permissions have been granted
For a proper work, the program requires your permission to access Internal Storage.\nWithout this permission, the program will not be able to work!

This program adds the text transfered to it, via the Share button, to the file specified by the user in the DOWNLOAD FOLDER.

Just enter the name of the file in which you would like to add selected text (without .txt. The file extension will be added automatically), and, then, send any selected text to it via the Share button ("Send" in some programs), it will be saved in the specified file.

If the file name is not specified, by default it will be saved to the _MWshare2save.txt file.

The underlining at the beginning of the file name is added specifically for the file to be at the top of the list of files in the Download folder.
Name of the file where to add:

Methods.
Selected text can be saved using two different methods:
 method 1: via the Share button (if the program, where the selection is made, has this button), with this method the program does not run and starts to run at the moment of transfer of the text for saving. After saving, it closes immediately.
method 2: there is a notification in the panel, when you click on it, selected text will be send to save.
Therefore, if some kind of RAM is used, it is extremely meager.
